title: The Fault in Our Mars
description: This image from NASA's Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter (MRO) of northern Meridiani Planum shows faults that have disrupted layered deposits. Some of the faults produced a clean break along the layers, displacing and offsetting individual beds.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
